price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߊ ߟߋ߬ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߣߐ߫ ߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߣߐ߫ ߝߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫، ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߛߍ߲߬ߓߍ߬ߟߊ߲߫ ߓߐ߫
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
